plot: A support group, steeped in Orwellian fear and accustomed to being judged by their weaknesses, tries to squash the rebelliousness of one of its new members, who is inspired by another members' dream.
title: Goodbye Horses
plot_es: A support group, steeped in Orwellian fear and accustomed to being judged by their weaknesses, tries to squash the rebelliousness of one of its new members, who is inspired by another members' dream.
plot_en: A support group, steeped in Orwellian fear and accustomed to being judged by their weaknesses, tries to squash the rebelliousness of one of its new members, who is inspired by another members' dream.
